XII.i.3.F.2.f
.
Effects of a Judgment on Parentâ€™s DIC
Under
38 CFR 3.262(i)
, if a tort claim is concluded in favor of a parent in receipt of DIC
an offset is required, and
the net proceeds of the judgment are countable income for DIC purposes.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
